adviseScripts.text: Oh boy...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I screwed up again today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: It's okay. Everyone makes mistakes.
How about you just stick to cleaning?
You say that so easily, but I really don't want to make any more mistakes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Either way, thanks for the encouraging words. I feel better already.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I've gotta cheer myself up and keep taking orders!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: No way! No can do!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I'm much too busy working at the Maid Cafe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I practice taking orders with Soda.
Cleaning is the bee's knees!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Clean clean, squeaky clean!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Want to clean together?
Cleaning is such a hassle.
Sure!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: It'll be great having someone else join me!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: What should we start with? How about the table?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: *Gasp* Do you hate cleaning, Master?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Whenever I clean, it feels like I've been cleansed myself!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda and I chat about cleaning for a while.
Master!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Do you prefer sunny or rainy days?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I like sunny days.
I like rainy days.
Me too!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Nothing beats the smell of a freshly sun-dried quilt.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I can't clean most places when it's raining, so I can get a bit down in the dumps.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: But there must be something to them if you like them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda and I discuss our favorite types of weather.
Aw man...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I broke a glass while I was cleaning today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Were you hurt?
Let's go buy another one.
No, I'm okay.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I appreciate your concern though!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Well, it's just that...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: it was a limited edition cup. I'm not sure buying another one will be so easy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: *Sigh* I really liked that cup...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda and I discuss the type of new cup we want to buy.
I really like you, Master!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Maybe even more than cleaning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I prefer you over cleaning as well, Soda.
... Okay.
Wow! Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: You and I are made for each other!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Um... don't you like me, Master?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: If you prefer Cocoa and Ade over me, just say so...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda and I have a nice heart-to-heart.
We're doing some spring cleaning at the Maid Cafe today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Do you think we should start with the kitchen or the lobby?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: The kitchen.
The lobby.
I was thinking the same thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: If there's anywhere you want to keep clean at all times, it's where you cook!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Okay, but the lobby is full of customers...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: If we go in there and start cleaning, we'll kick up dust everywhere.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Why don't we clean the kitchen first, and move on to the lobby after the customers are gone?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda tells me more about the plan to clean the Maid Cafe.
Master!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: What's your favorite food? Tell me and I'll make it for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Anything you make is my favorite.
I'm not really hungry.
Wow, really?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: That's so nice of you, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I'll cook something up for you right away. You're gonna love it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Oh... really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I was going to make you something super delicious...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Well, let me know whenever you get hungry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Time passes pleasantly as Soda whips up a storm for me.
Master, you look beat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Would you like a massage?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: If it's not too much trouble...
Actually, I feel fine.
Of course it's not!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Hmm, where should I start? Shoulders? Arms? Legs?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Why don't you lie in bed first?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Oh... you're not?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: It's just that you've got those dark circles under your eyes... I was worried about you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda gives me a massage.
I want to put a cute pattern on top of your parfait.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: What should I draw?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Cocoa's face.
Your face.
Hee hee, Cocoa is awfully cute I suppose.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I'll start with her mouth.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: M-me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: But I'm not that cute... well, I'll try my best.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda and I have a blast decorating our parfaits.
*Crunch crunch*
Soda is cleaning every nook and cranny of the Commander's Room.
Is my room really that dirty?
Is something on your mind?
Oh, hey Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: No, it's not that. It's just...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I'm feeling a bit blue today, so I was just doing some cleaning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Oh, hey Master. H-how did you know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I'm feeling a bit blue today, so I was just doing some cleaning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Cleaning always helps lift my spirits.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: That's so great that you can understand how I feel!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda tells me more about her thoughts and feelings.
I want to serve our customers meals, but I want to make it special.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Do you have any suggestions?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Try and make your eyes twinkle.
You're already special as is.
Hmm... like this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: It's... gorgeous.
Really? Heh heh.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Then I'll give them service with a smile every day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Y-you really think that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: But I want to be more special...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Hmm, how about if I try and smile like this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda practices smiling for a while.
Maid For You!♪ Maid For You!♪
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Guess what the lyrics are after that!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Meet your special maid!♪
Meet your special Soda!♪
Bingo!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I knew you'd get it right away.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I've been humming this tune quite often lately while I've been cleaning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Hee hee! It's nice to hear my name inserted into the lyrics,
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: but they technically go, "Meet your special maid!"
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda and I sing together for a while.
Cocoa gave me a big compliment today!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Guess what she said.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: That you were the best cleaner around.
That you were the best cook around.
Although I often get praised for my cleaning,
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: today she said the omurice I made was killer!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: That's right!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I made some omurice today, and you should have seen Cocoa's face.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: She was practically beaming! Once she put some ketchup on it, it was second-to-none.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Soda's secret recipe for omurice.
Master!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Is there anything you'd like to see me in other than a maid outfit?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: You look nice in maid costumes.
It'd be interesting to see you in some casual clothes.
I like maid outfits too,
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: but I'd like to try a new look every once in a while.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: That's exactly what I was thinking!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I've been wanting to try some more casual styles, but can't decide on what to wear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Would you like to go shopping with me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I go shopping with Soda for suitable clothes.
I want work smarter, not harder, just like Ade.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: But all I ever seem to do is make mistakes. I'm so sad...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: That's what makes you so endearing, Soda.
No need to be a perfectionist.
Really? That kind of thing can be endearing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad to hear that people think that way, especially you, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I suppose that's true.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Still though, I want to be a perfect maid like Ade!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I discuss with Soda how to be a perfect maid.
One, two...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Nice to have you back, Master!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: ... Hello.
What's up with the bizarre greeting?
Hee hee, thanks for playing along.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I wanted to see what it'd be like greeting you like a customer at the Maid Cafe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I've gotta say, it felt pretty good.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: It was like I became your own private maid, hee hee!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I wanted to see what it'd be like greeting you like we do with customers at the Maid Cafe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: And? What's the verdict?
Let me think...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I'm not telling! Hee hee!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda and I act as if we are in the Maid Cafe.
I went to Talentum Mall earlier today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: They had a sponge that can clear away old stains on sale! It was going for half-price.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: But I've already bought a lot of cleaning tools... What should I do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: A craftsman does not rely on their tools.
Consider it an investment towards your own happiness. Go for it.
Is that really true?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: But how else am I going to get rid of those ketchup stains in the kitchen?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Now that you mention it...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: That's a great point! And so true!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Cleaning is what brings me the most joy. If I should splurge on anything, this is it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I help Soda balance the books for the cafe.
Today we've got some cute cuddly bunny omurice hopping your way!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I figured that since we're not in the cafe, giving the dish a cute name might help give it that special something.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: By the magic invested in me, I command you to be delicious! Moe moe kyun!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Alakazam!
Looks like my magic spell worked.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: You look pretty cute when you're doing magic, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Do it again for me! Just once more. Hee hee!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: It's a magic spell.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: To make your food more delicious...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I thought you'd join in...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda teaches me several pre-meal magic spells.
Once in a lifetime opportunity! Get your photo taken with a maid!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Wanna try it, Master?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: You can choose your own theme.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Secret agents going undercover as cleaners.
The climactic scene of a romantic-comedy.
Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Perhaps Cocoa would be better suited for something like that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Sounds intriguing!
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: What exactly do people do during a scene like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Kiss, usually.
Wh-wha?! Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I had no idea...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Well, if that's what you want, erm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: I have a wonderful time taking selfies with Soda.
The shop window was all fogged up yesterday, so I doodled the password on there when no one was looking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Did you see what it was?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: A heart.
A mathematical formula.
Perfect! Password sent successfully.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: The next time the window fogs up,
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: maybe you could draw a password for me to memorize.
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: A mathematical formula?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Am I a secret genius without even knowing it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Soda

adviseScripts.text: Soda and I look into why the window keeps fogging up.
